SELECT U.id, U.group_id, email, username, PASSWORD , salt, STATUS , deleted, email_status, avatar_status, photo_url, time_offset, last_ip, last_time, last_act_time, created_date, last_modified_date, group_name as group_group_name, permission as group_permission FROM cms_user AS U LEFT OUTER JOIN cms_group AS G ON G.id = U.group_id LEFT OUTER JOIN cms_group_permission AS P ON P.group_id = G.id WHERE U.id =#{id}
